channel.title: BBC News - Asia

item.title: Raj Kundra: Indian millionaire embroiled in porn scandal
item.description: Raj Kundra, husband of Bollywood star Shilpa Shetty, has been accused of running a porn production ring.

item.title: Didi shares fall on reports China is planning penalties
item.description: The ride-hailing giant's shares are now down by more than 25% since their New York market debut last month.

item.title: Olympics opening ceremony director sacked for Holocaust joke
item.description: The decision to remove Kentaro Kobayashi comes a day before the opening show is due to be held.

item.title: Coronavirus: Was US money used to fund risky research in China?
item.description: What's the row about virus research in China between a prominent Republican and Dr Anthony Fauci?

item.title: Covid: China rejects WHO plan for second phase of virus origin probe
item.description: China says a proposal to audit labs shows "disrespect to common sense and arrogance towards science".

item.title: Indian tax authorities raid media outlets Bharat Samachar and Dainik Bhaskar
item.description: The government denies that the raids were in retaliation for unfavourable reporting.

item.title: China floods: Drone footage shows the scale of damage as clean up begins
item.description: As aerial pictures show the extent of destruction, our correspondent reports on the situation on the ground.

item.title: 'It was hard to breathe': China flood terror as train carriage submerged
item.description: Passengers tell of their fear after a busy subway carriage was flooded in central Henan province.

item.title: Australia and NZ pull out of Rugby League World Cup
item.description: Australia and New Zealand pull out of the Rugby League World Cup because of "player welfare and safety concerns" related to the Covid-19 pandemic.

item.title: John Coates: Australian Olympic boss in awkward 'mansplaining' row
item.description: In an awkward exchange, John Coates ordered politician Annastacia Palaszczuk to attend the Olympics.

item.title: Yuen Long attack: Hong Kong court gives seven jail time
item.description: The 2019 attack in Yuen Long was captured by victims and bystanders on phones and shocked the city.

item.title: China floods: People unite on social media to help flood victims
item.description: China's Weibo platform became an online space connecting people seeking help with rescue teams.

item.title: Tokyo 2020: Travelling to an Olympic Games like no other
item.description: The BBC's Mariko Oi reflects on her personal experience of covering the Games during a global pandemic.

item.title: The jungle-trekking Covid vaccinators helping to protect remote Indian villages.
item.description: Latgam Singpu and his team use rope bridges, school buses and incentives to reach remote villages.

item.title: Covid-19: India outrage over 'no oxygen shortage death data' claim
item.description: A minister's claim that no Covid deaths were reported from a lack of oxygen has sparked anger.

item.title: Olympic Games Tokyo 2020: India's top medal contenders
item.description: India sends its largest ever contingent to the Tokyo Olympics in the hope of bettering its medals tally.

item.title: The battle for Indonesia's Gold Island
item.description: There are fears that a mine will threaten Sangihe island's ancient forests and local water supply.

item.title: Mandira Bedi: What Hindu scriptures say about women at cremations
item.description: Indian actress Mandira Bedi made news for doing her husband's last rites, generally a male preserve.

item.title: Tokyo 2020: Does Japan have Covid under control?
item.description: With the Olympics starting this on Friday, more and more Covid cases are being reported.

item.title: Tokyo Olympics: Athletes find new ways to train in lockdown
item.description: Participants in the upcoming Games have been going to unusual lengths to stay in shape under restrictions.

item.title: Covid: Is China's vaccine success waning in Asia?
item.description: Thailand and Indonesia's switch to other Covid jabs has raised questions about Chinese vaccines.

item.title: Covid: Ivermectin, milk among Indonesia's unproven 'cures'
item.description: As Indonesia sees a surge fuelled by the Delta variant, misleading health claims are spreading.
